name: Sixth Horcrux
description:
In the aftermath of the Battle of Hogwarts, the uncanny demise of Lord Voldemort leads to the development of a new top-secret-and-for-good-reason project of off-the-books collaboration between the Minister of Magic (Kingsley Shacklebolt) and the newest addition to the British Auror office, you. 

When you are chosen to become the first Auror to wield dark magic, will you be able to accept the burdens of going down such a dark path?  Will you commit the act of unspeakable evil for the greater good, or will you commit the greater good to the act of unspeakable evil? 

The choice is yours, Dark Auror...

....................................................................................

this game is NOT FINISHED YET, so far there is only an introduction to the main characters that situates the player with a purpose and a means. I have already developed the Horcrux mechanics (creation, destruction, effects thereof, etc) but have less and less time nowadays due to work oligations. i will continue with making this game when i can find the time
